pullRequest.title: [FLINK-17432][docs-training] Rename Tutorials to Training for better SEO
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
This pull request renames the new Tutorials section of the documentation.
Brief change log

Renamed the tutorials directory to training
Changed all links
Reworded a few sentences to talk about training
Added a redirect from /tutorials to /training

commit.message: [FLINK-17432][docs-training] Rename Tutorials to Training for better SEO
